channel.title: CVE Feed for Team Emilia Projects -- Progress Planner
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Team Emilia Projects -- Progress Planner

item.title: CVE-2024-37422|2024-08-02T03:57:38.817Z -- team%20emilia%20projects -- progress%20planner
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Emilia Projects Progress Planner allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Progress Planner: from n/a through 0.9.2.
